title: "3. Open Science in the project lifecycle - collect & analyze "
date: today

::: {.callout-tip}
### Learning Objectives

By the end of this session, participants will be able to:

- Weigh ethical dilemmas facing reseachers and work according to good research practice standards  
- Find, access and evaluate the quality of data in domain-specific repositories   
    
:::
